notes: Single-family home, 2,500 sq ft, 15-year-old AC unit needs replacement. High-value customer, potential Bronze service plan enrollment.
Condo, 1,200 sq ft, new construction. Just moved in, needs annual PM setup. Referred by realtor.
Office building, 25,000 sq ft, 3x RTUs on roof. Quarterly PM contract, emergency service priority.
Retail plaza, 50,000 sq ft. HVAC + Plumbing + Electrical service. High-traffic location, needs 24/7 support.
Manufacturing facility, 100,000 sq ft, process cooling critical. Mission-critical SLA, 2-hour response time.
Data center, 75,000 sq ft, Tier III uptime (99.982%). Emergency power systems, UPS, generators. Critical infrastructure.
50 MW solar farm, 150 acres. O&M contract, inverter maintenance, tracker calibration. PPA with utility.
Single-family home, tankless water heater replacement needed. Emergency service for leak, potential Bronze plan.
Restaurant, grease interceptor maintenance, backflow testing. Health department inspections quarterly.
Hospital, medical gas systems, backflow preventers. Mission-critical, ASSE 6010 certified technicians only.
Single-family home, panel upgrade for EV charger. Tesla owner, needs 60A circuit install.
Office tower, 15 floors, electrical service upgrade. LED lighting retrofit, emergency power testing.
Warehouse, 200,000 sq ft, high-bay lighting, conveyor systems. Arc flash study required, NFPA 70E compliance.
Single-family home, 8kW solar system. Cash purchase, ITC claiming. Homeowner wants monitoring app access.
Retail store, 300kW rooftop solar. PPA agreement, net metering. Utility demand charge reduction critical.
Industrial facility, 2 MW rooftop + carport solar. Cash purchase, MACRS depreciation, battery storage.
Single-family home, tile roof replacement. Insurance claim for storm damage. Needs architectural shingles.
Apartment complex, 12 buildings, flat roofs. TPO membrane replacement, 10-year warranty required.
Elementary school, fire sprinkler system upgrade. NFPA 25 quarterly inspections, fire marshal approval.
Hospital, fire alarm + sprinkler + suppression systems. NFPA 72 monitoring, Joint Commission compliance.
